title: smoothie
author: smoothie

content: LEALANA 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER BITCOIN DIMES (0.1 BTC) w/ "RAINBOWS AND UNICORNS"Note - The rainbow coin is a prototype. I should have the actual rainbow silver coins (non-gold plated) in the next 1-2 weeks, in-hand.======================================================================SIX-COIN SET (Limited to 25 sets)           SOLD OUT   —————————————————————————————————————————————————————————CONTENTS:Regular Silver Finish CoinsONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME       ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME  Fully Gold PlatedONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME  Gold-Select PlatedRainbow Silver coinsONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLOREDONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold PlatedONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated** All 6 coins will have the same random serial #, come in clear airtight capsules, and their own unique certificate of authenticity (COA).======================================================================INDIVIDUAL COIN (Limited to 25 of each type sold as SINGLES except the regular silver version with a max mintage of 200)—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME      ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME  Fully Gold Plated ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME  Gold-Select Plated Rainbow coinsONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLOREDONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold PlatedONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated[/size][/b][/color]======================================================================SERIAL NUMBERS——————————————————Six-coin matching numbered sets are randomly selected from #1 thru #25Regular silver coins sold as single will have numbers #26 and above by default.GOLD-SELECT PLATING LAYOUT——————————————————MAX MINTAGES—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————Regular Silver Finish CoinsONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME………………………………………………………………………………..200       ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME  Fully Gold Plated…………………………………………………..50 (25 six-coin sets, 25 singles)ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME  Gold-Select Plated…………………………………………………..50 (25 six-coin sets, 25 singles)Rainbow Silver coinsONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED…………………………………………………..50 (25 six-coin sets, 25 singles)ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold Plated………………………………50 (25 six-coin sets, 25 singles)ONE 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated……………………………50 (25 six-coin sets, 25 singles)IMPORTANT =====> TIME FRAMES:—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————Approximately I should have the following versions in-hand (in my possession) in terms of time as follows:- regular silver fully gold plated  =  5-6 weeks - regular silver gold select plated version = 6-7 weeks- regular silver RAINBOW versions =  1-2 weeks- silver Rainbow gold plated and Rainbow gold select versions = 8-9 weeksPlease make the proper considerations for yourself when making a purchase for specific coin types listed above. Some types may end up coming in sooner than the estimated time frames above.CERTIFICATE OF AUTHENTICITY============================================Each coin will come with a certificate of authenticity along with a clear airtight capsule.If you are curious what the COAs will look like. They will look very similar in style to the 2013 COAs.BITCOIN ADDRESS, SERIAL #, AND KEY  =========================================Each individual coin is sold with two copies of the private key. One is printed on paper and the other is put on to the coin itself under the hologram. Both copies of the key are under the respective coin's hologram.Bitcoin addresses and associated serial #’s are also visible on the back of each coin. SEE EXAMPLE BELOW:HOW TO ORDER:Send me a private message on Bitcointalk.org or send an email to Smoothie@lealana.com with the following order format (see below).Code:Example order #1:ONE SIX-COIN SILVER SET TWO x 0.1 BTC  1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIMESONE x 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Fully Gold Plated ONE x 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated Example order #2:TWO SIX-COIN SILVER SET STHREE x 0.1 BTC  1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIMESONE x 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Gold Select Plated TWO x 0.1 BTC 1 oz 999 FINE SILVER DIME   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated PLEASE BE SAFE AND WATCH OUT FOR SCAMMERS ASKING FOR PAYMENT WITH SIMILAR USERNAMES.ALL PAYMENT MESSAGES WILL BE PGP SIGNED WITH MY PUBLIC KEY ON MY SIGNATURE. LINK - https://bitcoin-otc.com/viewgpg.php?nick=SmoothieSHIPPINGUS Domestic Shipping = $40International Shipping = $60PGP SIGNED ADDRESS LISTS=====================================SETS and SINGLES - PGP-signed lists will be provided.TERMS AND CONDITIONS: www.lealana.com/tac.phpTURNAROUND TIMECOINS WILL BE SHIPPED 2 to 4 WEEKS AFTER THE TIMEFRAMES LISTED ABOVE ^ (i.e. after I get them in my possession), AFTER PAYMENT HAS BEEN MADE, AND ASSUMING FUNDING OF THE COIN ADDRESSES ARE DONE IN A TIMELY MANNER. IN SOME CASES IT MAY SHIP SOONER. ALL COINS ARE REQUIRED TO BE FUNDED BY THE CUSTOMER BEFORE SHIPMENT. All Shipments are shipped via USPS Registered Mail with restricted delivery (meaning you have to show your ID and sign for the package).If you wish to purchase Lealana BTC 1 oz silver coins and do not wish to fund the coins, you may do so but each coin’s hologram will be marked as “BUYER FUNDED” denoting this coin was never funded before it shipped.FUNDING YOUR COIN(S) <—— Important1. All coins intended on being funded are required to be funded BEFORE they are shipped out. Any digital value that is stored on the coins while in transit are at your sole risk and responsibility. Lealana is not responsible for any digital cryptocurrency value while in transit by mail courier.2. Your coin address list will be PGP signed and sent to you for you to fund with the EXACT face value of (0.1 BTC).3. Should you miss this deadline your coin shipment will be delayed. DISCLOSURE OF RAINBOW COLOR VARIATION==========================================There is a possibility that the rainbow color may vary with these coins given the production process being used is different than the brass/nickel coin process.This is to notify you that this possibility may exist and that Lealana will not be held liable for any such color differences/variations from the pictures presented above. Before purchasing, please consider this and make your own decision whether to buy or not.

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: reserved1. No there will be no other coin sizes (no 1/2 oz or 1/4 oz versions) with this design for 2022 series.2. I apologize in advance as I am about to go to sleep. I'll deal with orders once I wake up Hawaiian Standard Time.3. Hope you all had a great turkey day!

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: Good Morning everyone. I just woke up. Will be going through these orders today and getting back to all interested parties.Thank you for all the kind comments and the overwhelming amount of interest in these coins.Mahalo for your patience,Smoothie

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: some people have been having issues with the privnote links.Please delete the first part that says "http://"The forum keeps adding some prefix to the links each time I paste into a message.The privnote links should work Just remove the first "http://" from the link and it should work.Very odd. First time it has ever happened.

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: I've contacted all interested parties regarding their respective orders. Please let me know when you send payment so I can confirm payment and have you locked in for everything on your order.I will say that if you haven't already contacted me and are on the fence about a SIX-COIN set please do so soon, they are going quite fast. Not sure how long I'll have them available for sale.I'll make an update tomorrow on the confirmed paid orders for them as that seems to be the ones to fly out the door first.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Spectacular!!! Like Da Vinci's first stroke on the Mona Lisa. Bitcoin's priceless works of art immortalized for all time. Glad im alive to see it.

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on December 04, 2022, 05:25:12 AMSpectacular!!! Like Da Vinci's first stroke on the Mona Lisa. Bitcoin's priceless works of art immortalized for all time. Glad im alive to see it.Wow Da Vinci? Sheesh I'm honored, but I personally don't think I'm at that level of artistry.Thanks for the compliment though.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: smoothie on December 05, 2022, 01:39:50 AMQuote from: Cryptogreatdane on December 04, 2022, 05:25:12 AMSpectacular!!! Like Da Vinci's first stroke on the Mona Lisa. Bitcoin's priceless works of art immortalized for all time. Glad im alive to see it.Wow Da Vinci? Sheesh I'm honored, but I personally don't think I'm at that level of artistry.Thanks for the compliment though.    Bitcoin will change the course of history. Early physical bitcoin represents a moment in time which only a few saw the inevitable path. Your coins are symbolic of time before everything changed. They are much more than metal and a hologram. They are belief in a better world, belief that the average man can have a voice, and belief that the chains of greed can be broken. These are the greatest collectables the world has ever known.
